completions.nl_description: Move all the objects of size 3 to the edges of the grid in the 'X' direction.
Move all objects of color 'X' outwards from any neighboring objects, towards empty cells.
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move all objects of color X to the top row, and then move them to the leftmost column within the top row.
Move all X objects towards the center one step.
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move all objects of color X downwards and all objects of color X upwards into adjacent empty cells, each as far as possible.
Move objects of color X towards objects with color X if they are neighbors and color is same or not R
Move all objects of color X to their neighboring cells.
Swap the position of all 'X' objects with their neighbors of size greater than 1.
Move all objects of color X one step outward.
Move objects of color X upward and objects of color O downward, if they are neighbors of each other.
Move all X objects to form a line pattern.
Move all objects of color X toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X upwards, if they are neighbors of objects of color X.
Move all objects of color X upward.
Move all X objects to the bottommost X object in their column.
Move all objects of color X one step in any unblocked direction while maintaining their original color.
Move objects of color X upward to create empty space around them
Move objects of color X one step in the direction specified by the initial R object.
Move the objects of color X from their original positions to form a new object of the same shape but placed near the object of color R
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move all X objects toward each other if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color X up one step if they are neighbors of an object of color R.
Move objects of color 'X' one step up.
Move all X objects to the row above them and change their color while keeping their relative positions.
Move all X-colored objects to the border.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) X)
        )
        (apply
            (move_node_max up)
            (move_node_max down)
            (move_node_max left)
            (move_node_max right)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color X inward to fill the gap left by moving neighboring objects outward.
Move all objects of color X (segments of size 1) toward the object of color X, without overlapping.
Move all objects of color X towards the leftmost X if they are neighbors of at least one X.
Move all objects of color X to the border of the grid.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) X)
        )
        (apply
            (move_node_max up_left)
            (move_node_max up)
            (move_node_max up_right)
            (move_node_max left)
            (move_node_max right)
            (move_node_max down_left)
            (move_node_max down)
            (move_node_max down_right)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color X toward the center in their column.
Move all objects of color X to the nearest position in the grid's boundary.
Swap positions of objects of color X and color O when they are adjacent.
Move all objects of color X towards the center of the grid.
Move all objects of color X to the edges of the grid.
Move all objects of color X towards the center of the grid.
Extend objects of color X to form a cross pattern.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) X)
        )
        (apply
            (extend_node down false)
            (extend_node up false)
            (extend_node left false)
            (extend_node right false)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all X objects diagonally up-left until they hit another object.
Move all objects of color X one step up if they are neighbors of an object of color R
Move the objects of color X one step towards the edges of the grid, maintaining their relative positions.
Move all objects of color X one step to the left and then recolor them to their original color.
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move black objects to the maximum possible distance along the row, avoiding overlapping, if they are neighbors of an object of color X.
Swap the positions of all pairs of objects colored X and O.
Rearrange and recolor the objects of color X.
Move objects of color X toward the adjacent objects
Move all objects of color X, maximum distance toward upwards.
Move all blocks of color X to the row above, if possible.
Move all objects of size 3 one step up and recolor them to color X.
Move all objects of color X toward the nearest object of color R if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color X to their neighbor position, then move objects of color X surrounded by objects to their neighbor position.
Move all objects of color X on the perimeter inside the grid to the nearest X in the middle
Switch the pattern of all 'X' characters between pair 1 and pair 2 of adjacent columns.
Swap all objects with color X and O.
Move all objects of color X to the nearest border cell
Move all X objects to the leftmost available position in the same row
Move all objects of color X to the nearest boundary.

(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) X)
        )
        (apply
            (move_node_max up)
            (move_node_max down)
            (move_node_max left)
            (move_node_max right)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color X to the border of their enclosing R object.

Move all objects of color X toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color X to top row of the grid.
Move all objects of color X up one step.
Move all objects of color X toward the nearest neighboring objects, if they are neighbors of it.
Move objects of color X one step further from other objects of color X.
Move all the red objects one step to the right and move all the green objects to their previous positions.

Move all objects of color X one step towards any other object.
Move the X objects to form a diagonal line.
Move all objects of color X to the periphery of the grid.

completions.nl_description: Move all objects with color X to the topmost available location

Move all objects other than those of color R toward objects of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
